firstNightReminder: Show the character tokens of 2 not-in-play characters
name: Urchin

firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal for the number of outsiders sat next to an evil player.
name: Customs Officer
ability: You start knowing how many outsiders are neighboring evil players. [+1 Outsider]
flavor: Have you filled in th proper forms?

otherNightReminder: Show the finger signal for the number of deaths prevented tonight.
name: Mortician
ability: Each night*, you learn how many deaths were prevented during the night.

otherNightReminder: If the Demon is marked with the "Chosen" reminder, show the "This character selected you" card, then the Whaler token. If the Demon doesn't kill a Minion tonight, a Minion dies immediately after the Demon acts.
name: Whaler
ability: Once per game, during the day, privately visit the Storyteller and choose a player. If you choose the Demon, that night the Demon learns this and a Minion dies.
flavor: Towards thee I roll, thou all-destroying but unconquering whale; to the last I grapple with thee; from hell's heart I stab at thee; for hate's sake I spit my last breath at thee.

name: Sherpa
ability: If a good player would die, you might die instead.
flavor: I will show you the way.

firstNightReminder: The Smuggler points to a player. If that player would wake tonight, mark them with the "Drunk" reminder, and have the Smuggler carry out their action (interact with the Smuggler the same way you would their chosen player, but don't say their role).
otherNightReminder: The Smuggler points to a player. If that player would wake tonight, mark them with the "Drunk" reminder, and have the Smuggler carry out their action (interact with the Smuggler the same way you would their chosen player, but don't say their role).
name: Smuggler
ability: Each night, choose a player. If they would wake tonight, they are drunk and you gain their ability until dusk. If you choose an evil player, you become evil and lose your ability.
flavor: I know how to get things.

firstNightReminder: The Vodou points to a character. If that character is in play, they are poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned player is no longer poisoned. The Vodou points to a character. If that character is in play, they are poisoned.
name: Vodou
ability: Each night, choose a character: if in play, they are poisoned tongith and tomorrow day.
flavor: I say a little prayer for you.

name: Patsy
ability: If the Demon dies, you die instead.

firstNightReminder: At the start of the game, if there are any homebrew characters on the character sheet or you are running homebrew rules, declare that the Bootlegger is in play and inform the group of all the homebrew characters and/or rules you are using in this game.
name: Bootlegger
ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.
